'''Radiant Spincrystal 101''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Throughout the Flow of Years]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located inside an underwater pavilion in [[Elton Trench]], [[Beryl Region]], [[Fontaine]].
